sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:25:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant. 3. Stir in curry paste and cook for 1 minute. 4. Add cubed tofu and cook until lightly browned. 5. Add diced vegetables, coconut milk, and vegetable broth. 6. Bring to a simmer and cook until vegetables are tender. 7. Season with salt and pepper. 8. Serve over cooked rice.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Asian">6b314b979755021069a3b6fce053af78</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Tofu (300g, cubed), Bell Pepper (1), Zuc</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Tofu and Vegetable Curry</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 15g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 45g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cube tofu. 2. Dice vegetables. 3. Mince garlic and ginger.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b8ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
